Major_Arcs.title: The Circus and the Strongmen Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around a circus setting, introducing Paul Bunyan as a performer and a conflict arising from jealousy and ambition of another strongman, Matto Grasso. It culminates in a confrontation and resolution involving Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction at the Circus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the circus setting and the character of Paul Bunyan as a strongman performer, alongside a spectator learning about the circus's arrival and a family observing the animals.

sub_scenes.title: Disturbance and Confrontation with Billings/Grasso
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the man in checkered shirt investigating a disturbance, leading to a confrontation with Billings, later revealed to be Matto Grasso, and escalating violence.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and New Opportunity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the aftermath of the fight, the circus owner's explanation, and the proposition for Paul Bunyan to become the new strongman.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Revenge and Bunyan's Heroics
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's revenge plot, including arson and releasing an ape, and Paul Bunyan's interventions to save the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy
The Ape's Release and the Keeper's Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Capture of Grasso
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the chase and confrontation with Grasso within the circus arena, culminating in his capture and Paul Bunyan's triumph.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's journey and his encounter with the 'Awful Ogress of Tibet', starting with a mysterious encounter in Tibet and leading to a confrontation with a magical and dangerous being.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and Talking Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with Marco Polo's arrival in Tibet and his bizarre encounter with a talking severed head in a forest.

narrative_arcs.title: The Talking Head's Gratitude and Guidance

sub_scenes.title: Hi-toun and the Distressed Woman
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hi-toun, a city in mourning, and Marco Polo's encounter with a distressed woman who leads him towards danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Mourning Hi-toun and Offers Assistance
Encounter with the Distressed Woman and the Suspicious Castle

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo entering the suspicious castle and the revelation of the woman as the Ogress of Tibet, leading to a direct confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Unmasking the Ogress
Confrontation with the Ogress and Her Tusked Mice

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Escape from the Cloaked Figure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays another encounter, distinct from the Ogress, where a swordsman is captured by a cloaked figure using snakes, showcasing a different type of threat.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Rescue from the Ogre
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a captivity narrative where an ogre holds prisoners, including Princess Lotus, and culminates in a daring escape using a discovered weapon.

narrative_arcs.title: Despair and Discovery of a Weapon
Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father
Palace Arrival, Reunion, and Refused Reward

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of treasure, betrayal, and revenge set in a penal colony and England, narrated by a Treasure Keeper, focusing on the consequences of greed and deceit.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Initial Negotiation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Treasure Keeper as narrator and sets up the initial scenario in a penal colony where a prisoner seeks a deal with the Captain.

narrative_arcs.title: Map Exchange and Promise of Freedom

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Vow of Revenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the Captain's betrayal, the prisoner Jordan's imprisonment, and his eventual release with a burning desire for revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to England and Renewed Vow of Revenge

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Tragic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's pursuit of the Captain, their confrontation, and the violent climax involving the treasure in the attic, leading to a moral conclusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Violent Confrontation and Claim of Victory
Moral of the Story: Money is Evil

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Dr. Styx and his investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, dealing with ghostly encounters and resolving a past murder through forgiveness and love.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Dr. Styx and the Estate's Problem
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the initial problem of the haunted Matthews estate, setting up his investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor and the Supernatural Expert Discuss the Matthews Estate
Arrival at the Haunted Matthews Place
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Mr. Northrup's (Dr. Styx) initial encounter and confrontation with the ghost of Vincent Matthews in the haunted house.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with the Ghostly Figure Inside the House
Unwavering Confrontation and Declaration of Intent
Desperate Struggle and Reversal of Fortune

sub_scenes.title: Resolution through Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the haunting by focusing on dialogue, revelation of past sins, and ultimately, redemption through forgiveness and sisterly love.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Violence, Fear, and the Path to Salvation
The Revelation of Rosalind's Murder and Fate

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Voyages and Mutiny
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Henry Hudson's voyages to find the Northwest Passage, detailing his commission, the struggles, and the eventual mutiny leading to his mysterious disappearance.

sub_scenes.title: Commission and First Voyage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the historical context of Henry Hudson's voyages and details his commission by the Dutch East India Company for his first voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Last Voyage
The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Captain Hudson
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Disillusionment and the Decision to Turn Back

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Tragic End
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hudson's second voyage, the harsh conditions leading to mutiny, and his ultimate fate of being set adrift.

narrative_arcs.title: Trapped in Ice and Growing Despair
The Ice Melts and Voyage Resumes

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Tartar Challenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Arabian Knight, Hassan, on a rescue mission to save a kidnapped woman from the Tartars, culminating in a trial by combat and a resolution based on honor and bravery.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Arabian Knight and the Tartar threat, followed by Hassan being tasked by the Caliph with a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Introduction and the Tartar Threat
Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission
The Journey to the Oasis of El-Sholem
Deserted Oasis and Discovery of Tartar Trail
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offer of Water and Doubt on the Mission

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's infiltration of the Tartar camp, his stealthy takedown of a sentry, and his subsequent discovery and capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambush and Subjugation of the Sentry

sub_scenes.title: Trial by Combat and Honorable Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Kurgan's challenge of trial by combat, the fierce fights, and the honorable resolution where Kurgan keeps his word, leading to Hassan's success and a budding romance.

narrative_arcs.title: Kurgan Keeps His Word and Bids Farewell
Woman Explains the Kiss and Praises Hassan
